title: If the area under a non-buildable reservation is more than 500 sq
clause_text: If the area under a non-buildable reservation is more than 500 sq.mt. minimum 50% of the area under reservation shall be developed for the same purpose and handed over to Municipal Corporation, subject to minimum of 500 sq.mt. and remaining land shall be allowed for development.
section: (#) Development of Reservations contemplated in Development Plan falling in the area of URC â€“
